name: Zombie Madhouse
description:
You're agent Hunter, veteran special forces soldier specialized in containing BioHazard outbreaks. After the last incident, a Research facility complex and its nearby town got overrun and an infection broke through.  You're the only one that can contain this threat. Prep your gear and get ready for action!

This is just a protoype of a game idea. Game was made as a final project for my game development course.  Only has two missions available, you can play them individually or start with mission 1 and progress through both.  Let me know waht you think.
